price: Basi walio amini na wakatenda mema watapata maghfira na riziki za ukarimu.
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
footnotes: Na wale walio muamini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, na wakatenda vitendo vyema, watapata kutokana na Mwenyezi Mungu kusamehewa dhambi zao walizo ziingia, kama kadhaalika watavyo pata riziki ya ukarimu huko Peponi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
